mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.personname AS "personname", a.mobilephonne AS "mobilephonne", a.telephone AS "telephone", a.email AS "email", a.address AS "address", a.bank AS "fsBank.id", b.open_bank AS "fsBank.openBank", b.company AS "fsBank.company", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
left join fs_bank b on a.bank=b.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fs_good_cooperation a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.personname LIKE '%'||#{personname}||'%' '%'+#{personname}+'%' concat('%',#{personname},'%')
AND a.mobilephonne LIKE '%'||#{mobilephonne} '%'+#{mobilephonne} concat('%',#{mobilephonne})
AND a.telephone LIKE '%'||#{telephone} '%'+#{telephone} concat('%',#{telephone})
AND a.email LIKE '%'||#{email}||'%' '%'+#{email}+'%' concat('%',#{email},'%')
AND a.address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' '%'+#{address}+'%' concat('%',#{address},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fs_good_cooperation( id, name, personname, mobilephonne, telephone, email, address, bank, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{personname}, #{mobilephonne}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{fsBank.id}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fs_good_cooperation SET name = #{name}, personname = #{personname}, mobilephonne = #{mobilephonne}, telephone = #{telephone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, bank = #{fsBank.id}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select coalesce(max(CAST(id as DECIMAL)),0)+1 FROM fs_good_cooperation
